input.sentences: the group got take-out for the get-together .
they started the night by looking at photos from one couple 's recent vacation .
after enjoying the photos | they moved on to playing poker .
one friend pulled out a digital camera and the other began goofing off .
his girlfriend got annoyed with the silliness | and they got into a fight that ended the party .
output.sentences: Most days, the young man spent a most of his time at his desk, including his lunch hour.
When he got home, he looked at photos for ideas on what to do & who to ask to his weekend trip.
He decided on poker with the guys.
During one hand, he made silly faces to trick other players into thinking he had a bad hand.
Still, someone had a better hand & he lost.
